ref: 61 agnimantha ʻ producing fire by friction ʼ, m. ʻ the tree Premna spinosa ʼ Suśr. [agní -- 1, mantha -- ]
Pa. aggimantha -- m. ʻ Premna spinosa (the wood of which was used for kindling fire by friction) ʼ;
H. agẽth m. ʻ a tree the wood of which is used for kindling the sacred fire, usu. Ficus religiosa ʼ.
